Author: KOSIUS#0001
Content: @Elmis update your Ledger

Author: CoinKing88#1540
Content: I updated my ledger to firmware 1.6, trying to recover the accounts. BTC account is working fine but when i try to make a KMD account (after installing the KMD app via Ledger Live) it gets stuck on "open application" while i have it open on my ledger. Anyone else got the same issue or have a solution? It says "application ready" on the ledger but Ledger live is stuck on "connect and unlock ledger" after opening the KMD program (before that the first step "open ledger and unlock" was ticked off)

Author: CoinKing88#1540
Content:
Got it working, seems to be a general ledger bug. Solotion that worked for me (found online on the Ledger forum): 
1. Close Ledger Live app
2. Open crypto app on your device (to which you want to add the account)
3. Start Ledger Live (without closing crypto app)
4. Add the account (now it should work)

Author: Elmis#0347
Content: Thanks to the three of you, Arno, Kosius and CoinKing88, I'll try these solutions and hopefully I'll be lucky.

Author: pcfixecrypto#2852
Content: Ok I've found out that now you can clamin your KMD reward on the ledger nano S . Is it possible to claim all the rewards I have unclaimed on KOMODO Ocean Qt directly on the Ledger Nano S if I use my private key ?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @pcfixecrypto you have all your coins in a single address and know its private key?

Author: pcfixecrypto#2852
Content: If I remember correctly there is only one adress on my ocean qt wallet. And I have my private key

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
ok, install <https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/download/v0.5.9-2/Agama-Windows-v0.5.9-2.zip>
login using your private key directly: <https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed>
claim your rewards
then send all the coins to your ledger address
claiming on ledger works, but it stopped working with the latest firmware update
<https://github.com/LedgerHQ/ledgerjs/issues/422>
it should be fixed till the next time you need to claim
@pcfixecrypto

Author: pcfixecrypto#2852
Content: I'll try that, thank you
